code: export var MovingBackGround=function MovingBackGround(bg){function movingBackgroundImage(){var windowWidth=window.innerWidth/5;var windowHeight=window.innerHeight/5;bg.addEventListener('mousemove',function(e){var mouseX=e.clientX/windowWidth;var mouseY=e.clientY/windowHeight;bg.style.transform="translate3d(-".concat(mouseX*1.5,"px, -").concat(mouseY*1.5,"px, 0)");});}return{movingBackgroundImage:movingBackgroundImage};};
